roleset.name: to formulate again
roleset.note: REFORMULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reformulate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from reformulate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: But [the plan]-3 now is being `` reformulated [*-3], '' Delmed said [*T*-1] , [*-4] declining [*-2] to provide most of the new terms of the combination .
